metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7508 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in GLPI 0.90.4 allow an authenticated remote attacker to execute arbitrary SQL commands by using a certain character when the database is configured to use Big5 Asian encoding.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
